about_the_game:
New events for all characters, including Yuzu and Lime, will be added.

A new resort facility​ will be added to Hoshinomiya.
This is a new wonderful spot for after school outing.

*You must have the latest patch installed in order to use this content.

This content can only be accessed between Chapters 3 and 10.
Depending on your progress through the game, it is possible that you will not be able to access this content unless you restart the game from an earlier point.

Save money on content for this game by purchasing the Season Pass.
